string.text: Tap to reload. Hold to check ammo. Double-tap to select ammo type. Modifier + Tap to unjam/inspect. Note 1: the engine "Reload" keybind is equally taken into account by this mod (can be bound to same key). Note 2: Make sure the engine "Ammo Selector" key is still bound to something else (e.g. "Y").
Modifier + Reload key to unjam or inspect weapon.
